name: MYC_CONVO_ABT_RX_ORDER
description: Prescriptions associated with the MyChart message conversation.

columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RX_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The prescription order record that this conversation is about.
